unnormalised: Trying to find their office is a real adventure! Their website says they're at "B-27, Ansal Plaza, August Kranti Marg, New Delhi, 110049" but honestly, Ansal Plaza is like a maze designed by someone who's had way too much chai. I swear, I walked past "Shop No. 14" six times. Google Maps led me to what looked suspiciously like a parking attendant's booth. Maybe they should update their address to "Somewhere near Barista, but good luck finding it." ðŸ˜‚
